name: accuracy (egg)
description:
Accuracy is an early beta, high-paced, bhop-style first-person shooter that challenges players to compete in adrenaline-fueled multiplayer battles with 100% accuracy, no spray mechanics, and strategic smoke grenades. Set in a confined map designed for intense skirmishes, this game is ideal for those who crave fast-paced, precision-based combat.

Key Features
High-Pace Bhop Gameplay: Experience exhilarating bhop-style movement mechanics that keep the action non-stop and the adrenaline pumping.

100% Accuracy & No Spray: Master the art of precision shooting with a unique weapon system that rewards players for skillful aiming and quick reflexes.

Smoke Grenades: Outsmart your opponents by deploying smoke grenades to create tactical cover and disrupt their line of sight.

Multiplayer Hamachi: Connect with friends and rivals through Hamachi-powered multiplayer, ensuring stable and lag-free matches.

Compact Battle Arena: Fight in a small, close-quarters map designed to encourage intense firefights and keep players on their toes.

Continuous Development: As an early beta, Accuracy is dedicated to ongoing improvements, updates, and community feedback to deliver the ultimate fast-paced FPS experience. Put your skills to the test and dominate the battlefield in Accuracy, where only the swiftest and most precise shooters will prevail.
